professionalSummary.title: Professional Summary
professionalSummary.content: As a motivated Full Stack Developer, Iâ€™m eager to apply my experience in app development and web projects. I'm seeking opportunities where I can manage web development from start to finish while growing professionally. My skills include building websites, setting up servers, and providing high-quality technical support. I'm committed to delivering excellent web solutions and staying updated with industry trends.

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
items: Experience with AWS S3, Lambda, JavaScript, Spring Boot, ZUL, Java APIs, and ReactJS for a Membership Portal Application.
Integrated third-party payment gateways (ECPay, QCRB, Dragonpay) with MySQL databases.
Set up local server tunneling for improved development efficiency.

experience.title: Web Developer
items: Developed and enhanced e-commerce sites on WordPress and WooCommerce.
Optimized performance, added user-friendly features, and integrated payment gateways.
Created targeted landing pages to boost lead generation and conversions.

experience.title: Hosting Support
items: Managed servers and provided expert support, specializing in diagnosing and resolving WordPress issues, and overseeing web hosting, server configurations, and domain management.
